presentationColumns.name: Days Sales Outstanding
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Accounts Receivable / Daily Revenue. Where: Daily Revenue = Revenue YTD /Number of Cumulative Elapsed Days.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Days Sales Outstanding - YTD Revenue

presentationColumns.name: AR Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Revenue for the Period * 365 / AR Amount. Where: Daily Revenue for the Period = Revenue / Number of days for the selected period.

presentationColumns.name: Days Payables Outstanding
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Accounts Payable / Daily Cost Of Revenue. Where: Daily Cost of Revenue = Cost of Revenue YTD / Cumulative Number of Days.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Days Payables Outstanding - YTD Purchase

presentationColumns.name: AP Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Purchases for the Period * 365 / AP Amount. Where: Daily Purchases for the Period = Purchases / Number of days for the selected period.

presentationColumns.name: Operating Cycle
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Days Sales Outstanding + Avg Inventory Days.

presentationColumns.name: Cash Cycle
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Days Sales Outstanding - YTD Revenue (+) Avg Inventory Days (-) Days Payables Outstanding - YTD Purchase. Where: Days Sales Outstanding - YTD Revenue = AR Amount / Daily Revenue. Days Payables Outstanding - YTD Purchase = AP Amount / Daily Purchases.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Inventory Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Inventories / Daily Cost of Revenue. Where: Daily Cost of Revenue = Cost of Revenue / Number of days from beginning day to till date of the fiscal year.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Avg Inventory Days

presentationColumns.name: Inventory Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Cost of Revenue * 365 / Inventories. Where: Daily Cost of Revenue = Cost of Revenue / Number of days from beginning day to till date of the fiscal year.

presentationColumns.name: Working Capital Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Revenue * 365 / (Current Assets - Current Liabilities).
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Working Capital Turnover

presentationColumns.name: Fixed Assets Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Revenue * 365 / Net PPE. Where: Daily Revenue = Revenue / Number of days from beginning day to till date of the fiscal year.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Fixed Assets Turnover

presentationColumns.name: LT Assets Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Revenue * 365 / Long Term Assets. Where: Daily Revenue = Revenue / Number of days from beginning day to till date of the fiscal year.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.LT Assets Turnover

presentationColumns.name: Total Assets Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Daily Revenue * 365 / Total Assets.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Assets Turnover
